page.title: 13AUCHTERMUCHTY..INDUSTRY
page.content: {The Rippin Group, International {Building Specialists, Station Road, {Auchtermuchty, Fife, KY14 7DP. The business was set up in 1965 and was developed on the site vacated by the closure of the railway line to Auchtermuchty from Ladybank. The company supplies steel frameworks for any type of building, whether for agriculture or industry. Having started as a one man business, the company now employs approx. 100 men. There is a lot of automation, but welding is still done manually. Computers are used in the office and on the shop floor. Rippin has a competitive market stretching all over the U.K. It is the third largest company involved in this type of construction at present (1985) in the U.K. Rippin relies on its reputation to secure orders.
